channel.title: How to make a showinterface?
channel.description:
hello guys..
i know how to make a interface, but how to do text oon it?
[code] showInterface(11104); sendQuest("Ho ho ho, you don't have the correct items yet, noob!", 11105); [/code] thats good? or noT?

item.dc:creator: @_pecial §pecial
item.description:
@_pecial wrote:

You could try it, but i would suggest looking at one of your codes in your the first click on npc
and try setting it out the same because i know that if(npc= can’t be right but i don’t know what it looks like off by heart

Read full topic

item.title: How to make a showinterface?
item.dc:creator: @I_D_D_S_I I D D S I
item.description:
@I_D_D_S_I wrote:

[quote="§pecial, post:16, topic:252250"]Ill try set it out, because i dont have my server files any more it will be off the top if my head

And change the **** to npc id

[code]

If(npc=****){
public void InterfaceName(){

  clearQuestInterface();
  sendQuest("Title", 8144);  //Title
  sendQuest("", 8145);
  sendQuest("", 8147);
  sendQuest("", 8148); 
  sendQuest("", 8149);
  sendQuest("", 8150);
  sendQuest("", 8151);
  sendQuest("", 8152);
  sendQuest("", 8153);
  sendQuest("", 8154);
  sendQuest("", 8155);
  sendQuest("", 8156);
  sendQuest("", 8157);
  sendQuest("", 8158);
  sendQuest("", 8159);
  sendQuest("", 8160);
  sendQuest("", 8161);
  sendQuest("", 8162);
  sendQuest("", 8163);
  sendQuest("", 8164);
  sendQuest("", 8165);
  sendQuest("", 8166);
  sendQuest("", 8167);
  sendQuest("", 8168);
  sendQuest("", 8169);
  sendQuest("", 8170);
  sendQuest("", 8171);
  sendQuestSomething(8143);
  showInterface(8134);
  flushOutStream();

}

[/code] im sure it will be something like that[/quote]

ii just delet this and add that 1? sendQuest("@dre@Snta event.", 8144); //Title sendQuest("", 8145); clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("Make sure you did NOTE your items.", 8148); sendQuest("", 8149); sendQuest("", 8150); sendQuest("How do we get cake?", 8151); sendQuest("Go south of the bank, and do bakker steal. ", 8152); sendQuest("", 8153); sendQuest("How to get coal ore's?", 8154); sendQuest("Get a mining lvl of 30, and mine coal!", 8155); sendQuest("Mining in the house west of home.", 8156); sendQuest("", 8157); sendQuest("How do we get Raw lobster's?", 8158); sendQuest("Fish them at catherby, or buy?", 8159); sendQuest("", 8160); sendQuest("How do we get dragon bones?", 8161); sendQuest("Buy them, or kill a Metal Dragon!", 8162); sendQuestSomething(8141); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream();

item.title: How to make a showinterface?
item.dc:creator: @I_D_D_S_I I D D S I
item.description:
@I_D_D_S_I wrote:

[quote=“supra s, post:8, topic:252250”]public void InterfaceName(){

	clearQuestInterface();
	sendQuest("Title", 8144);  //Title
	sendQuest("", 8145);
	sendQuest("", 8147);
	sendQuest("", 8148); 
	sendQuest("", 8149);
	sendQuest("", 8150);
	sendQuest("", 8151);
	sendQuest("", 8152);
	sendQuest("", 8153);
	sendQuest("", 8154);
	sendQuest("", 8155);
	sendQuest("", 8156);
	sendQuest("", 8157);
	sendQuest("", 8158);
	sendQuest("", 8159);
	sendQuest("", 8160);
	sendQuest("", 8161);
	sendQuest("", 8162);
	sendQuest("", 8163);
	sendQuest("", 8164);
	sendQuest("", 8165);
	sendQuest("", 8166);
	sendQuest("", 8167);
	sendQuest("", 8168);
	sendQuest("", 8169);
	sendQuest("", 8170);
	sendQuest("", 8171);
	sendQuestSomething(8143);
	showInterface(8134);
	flushOutStream();

}

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("your :: command")) {

InterfaceName();
}[/quote]

well, its for a santa quest.
but i got this: case 111: talk("Get the next items. Put them NOTED! you get a reward.", 1552); break; case 112: talk("5 Cake's 5 Coal Ores 4Raw lobsters 3 Dragon Bones", 1552); break; case 113: if(playerHasItem(1892, 5) && playerHasItem(454, 5) && playerHasItem(378, 4) && playerHasItem(537, 3)) { talk("Happy New year, And have fun.",1552); deleteItem(1892, 5); deleteItem(454, 5); deleteItem(378, 4); deleteItem(537, 3); addItem(2749, 25); addItem(2750, 25); addItem(2751, 25); addItem(4084, 25); } else { showInterface(8134); sendQuest("@dre@Snta event.", 8144); //Title sendQuest("", 8145); clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("Make sure you did NOTE your items.", 8148); sendQuest("", 8149); sendQuest("", 8150); sendQuest("How do we get cake?", 8151); sendQuest("Go south of the bank, and do bakker steal. ", 8152); sendQuest("", 8153); sendQuest("How to get coal ore's?", 8154); sendQuest("Get a mining lvl of 30, and mine coal!", 8155); sendQuest("Mining in the house west of home.", 8156); sendQuest("", 8157); sendQuest("How do we get Raw lobster's?", 8158); sendQuest("Fish them at catherby, or buy?", 8159); sendQuest("", 8160); sendQuest("How do we get dragon bones?", 8161); sendQuest("Buy them, or kill a Metal Dragon!", 8162); sendQuestSomething(8141); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); } break;

when i click on the santa, he will tell that, yes ther will go up a screen, but it goes up, like 100 times, so u cant read the text, it comes, away,comes,away,comes,away and that whole time for 1 sec.

also when i did at a sendMessage it say it like 100 time, after 1 sec it will say it again.

how to do it?

thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: How to make a showinterface?
item.dc:creator: @supra_s supra s
item.description:
@supra_s wrote:

public void InterfaceName(){

	clearQuestInterface();
	sendQuest("Title", 8144);  //Title
	sendQuest("", 8145);
	sendQuest("", 8147);
	sendQuest("", 8148); 
	sendQuest("", 8149);
	sendQuest("", 8150);
	sendQuest("", 8151);
	sendQuest("", 8152);
	sendQuest("", 8153);
	sendQuest("", 8154);
	sendQuest("", 8155);
	sendQuest("", 8156);
	sendQuest("", 8157);
	sendQuest("", 8158);
	sendQuest("", 8159);
	sendQuest("", 8160);
	sendQuest("", 8161);
	sendQuest("", 8162);
	sendQuest("", 8163);
	sendQuest("", 8164);
	sendQuest("", 8165);
	sendQuest("", 8166);
	sendQuest("", 8167);
	sendQuest("", 8168);
	sendQuest("", 8169);
	sendQuest("", 8170);
	sendQuest("", 8171);
	sendQuestSomething(8143);
	showInterface(8134);
	flushOutStream();

}

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("your :: command")) {

InterfaceName();
}
